basic_information.scholarship_name: The Risley Family Endowed Scholarship for Non-Traditional Students
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Eligible for full disbursement if graduating in December
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: This scholarship is available to any student within the AESS department who have a minimum GPA of 3.0. Eligibility Requirements Must have received high school diploma or equivalent no less than 5 years prior to this award Minimum GPA of 3.0 Undergraduate or graduate student for the upcoming fall semester Attach a document that expresses how winning this award will improve your life Upload a copy of your UCO transcript Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
